"use client" import { Select, SelectContent, SelectItem, SelectTrigger, SelectValue } from "@/components/ui/select" import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button" import ArrowUpDown from "lucide-react/icons/arrow-up-down" // Common languages like Google Translate const LANGUAGES = [ { code: "auto", name: "Detect language", flag: "ðŸŒ" }, { code: "en", name: "English", flag: "ðŸ‡¬ðŸ‡§" }, { code: "es", name: "Spanish", flag: "ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡¸" }, { code: "fr", name: "French", flag: "ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡·" }, { code: "de", name: "German", flag: "ðŸ‡©ðŸ‡ª" }, { code: "it", name: "Italian", flag: "ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡¹" }, { code: "pt", name: "Portuguese", flag: "ðŸ‡µðŸ‡¹" }, { code: "ru", name: "Russian", flag: "ðŸ‡·ðŸ‡º" }, { code: "ja", name: "Japanese", flag: "ðŸ‡¯ðŸ‡µ" }, { code: "ko", name: "Korean", flag: "ðŸ‡°ðŸ‡·" }, { code: "zh", name: "Chinese", flag: "ðŸ‡¨ðŸ‡³" }, { code: "ar", name: "Arabic", flag: "ðŸ‡¸ðŸ‡¦" }, { code: "hi", name: "Hindi", flag: "ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡³" }, { code: "nl", name: "Dutch", flag: "ðŸ‡³ðŸ‡±" }, { code: "sv", name: "Swedish", flag: "ðŸ‡¸ðŸ‡ª" }, { code: "da", name: "Danish", flag: "ðŸ‡©ðŸ‡°" }, { code: "no", name: "Norwegian", flag: "ðŸ‡³ðŸ‡´" }, { code: "fi", name: "Finnish", flag: "ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡®" }, { code: "pl", name: "Polish", flag: "ðŸ‡µðŸ‡±" }, { code: "cs", name: "Czech", flag: "ðŸ‡¨ðŸ‡¿" }, { code: "hu", name: "Hungarian", flag: "ðŸ‡­ðŸ‡º" }, { code: "tr", name: "Turkish", flag: "ðŸ‡¹ðŸ‡·" }, { code: "th", name: "Thai", flag: "ðŸ‡¹ðŸ‡­" }, { code: "vi", name: "Vietnamese", flag: "ðŸ‡»ðŸ‡³" } ] interface TranslatePanelProps { sourceLang: string targetLang: string onSourceLangChange: (lang: string) => void onTargetLangChange: (lang: string) => void onSwapLanguages: () => void } export default function TranslatePanel({ sourceLang, targetLang, onSourceLangChange, onTargetLangChange, onSwapLanguages }: TranslatePanelProps) { const getLanguage = (code: string) => { return LANGUAGES.find(lang => lang.code === code) || LANGUAGES[1] } return (
{/* Language Selection Bar */}
